item.description: Trailhead: Take I93 north to exit 24,take US3 to Holderness,make a left onto NH113 for 1.1 miles,Cotton Mountain Parking Lot on the left side of the road.We will be hiking the Crawford-Ridgepole Trail to the summits of Cotton Mountain (1200') and Mount Livermore (1500').Good views from both summits. 3.8 miles,4 hours estimated time.-----Steve-----As a condition of attending this meetup you agree to release,hold harmless,and indemnify the organizer(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage,injury,illness and/or death,including those caused by negligence and or other reasons.You also agree to assume all risk associated with this meetup and agree to know and follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com
item.how_to_find_us: Black Colorado pick up truck NH2431202
item.name: EASY HIKE-MOUNTS COTTON AND LIVERMORE
